GhApi.list_events[source]

GhApi.list_events(per_page=30, page=1, username=None, org=None, owner=None, repo=None)

Fetch public events for repo network, org, user, or all

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

GhApi.list_events_parallel[source]

GhApi.list_events_parallel(per_page=30, n_pages=8, username=None, org=None, owner=None, repo=None)

Fetch as many events from list_events in parallel as available

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

list_events and list_events_parallel support the following:

Events from Example
Organization api.list_events_parallel(org='fastai')
User api.list_events_parallel(username='jph00')
Repository network api.list_events_parallel(owner='fastai', repo='fastcore')
All public api.list_events_parallel()
{% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class GhEvent[source]

GhEvent() :: AttrDict

Class for events returned from `fetch_events

print([snake2camel(o)+'Event' for o in Event])

GhApi.fetch_events[source]

GhApi.fetch_events(n_pages=3, pause=0.4, per_page=30, types=None, incl_bot=False, username=None, org=None, owner=None, repo=None)

Generate an infinite stream of events, optionally filtered to types, withpause` seconds between requests

You can use the description and emoji properties to display events, e.g:

{% raw %} 
evts = load_sample_events()
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
exs = [first(evts, risinstance(o)) for o in described_evts]
def _fmt_evt(o):
    return f'{o.emoji} **{o.actor.login}** ' + truncstr(f'{o.description} *{o.repo.name}',60) + '*'

Markdown('|Type|Description|\n|:-|:-|\n' + '\n'.join(f'{o.type}|{_fmt_evt(o)}' for o in exs))
Type Description

DeleteEvent|‚úÇ dependabot[bot] deleted branch "packit-0.5.0" in paketo-buildpacks/occam CreateEvent|üè≠ github-classroom[bot] created repository in Introduction-to-Programming-OSOWSKI/‚Ä¶ PullRequestEvent|üì¨ JerryMacedoCastro opened PR #1 on JerryMacedoCastro/tb-arquitetura-js MemberEvent|üíÉ github-classroom[bot] added member noraahlman23 in Introduction-to-Programming-O‚Ä¶ PublicEvent|‚ô• navikt made public repo navikt/syfoinntektsmelding PullRequestReviewCommentEvent|üó® fruttasecca created review comment on PR #97 in orchest/orchest ForkEvent|üçΩ amin-lotf forked vinaygaba/Learn-Jetpack-Compose-By-Example CommitCommentEvent|üéâ vercel[bot] created commint comment in Samaraferreira/test-frontend WatchEvent|üëÄ ikarius started watching jorgebucaran/awsm.fish PullRequestReviewEvent|üíå fruttasecca created PR review in orchest/orchest ReleaseEvent|üöÄ github-actions[bot] published release v1.1.3 in vouv/srun IssuesEvent|üêõ efritz opened issue #16915 on sourcegraph/sourcegraph GollumEvent|üìö TradingToolCrypto created wiki page in TradingToolCrypto/TradingTool-Wiki IssueCommentEvent|üí¨ jerhard created comment on issue #2570 in ls1intum/Artemis
